messages.title: Labour's record in Coventry
messages.content: A proud record to represent in Parliament, with benefits from investment in services that matter to you no matter what age you are. Delivering in government and right here in Coventry we have the proof.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Coventry’s new University Hospital has brought local people the quality health care they deserve.
Nineteen Children’s Centres have opened in Coventry with four more on the way, ten schools are also being rebuilt or refurbished across the city.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Free Swimming for young and old people
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Free swimming available to all under 16s and over 60s across Coventry.

mentions.candidate: I am proud to represent you in Parliament.

issues.health: A brand new world-class hospital - Coventry’s new University Hospital has brought local people the quality health care they deserve.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am proud to represent you in Parliament.

politicalExperience.role: Your Labour Candidate for Coventry South

quotes.text: Labour offers a Future Fair For All. The Conservatives offer a future only for the few.

images.caption: Photo of a brand new world-class hospital

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet focuses on local achievements and services without specific election date.
